name: blaze-platform
description: Blaze Platform Monorepo - Complete financial technology stack for global payments

scripts.sync:push: git submodule foreach 'git push origin HEAD:$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)' && git push --recurse-submodules=on-demand
scripts.sync:checkout: git submodule foreach 'git checkout main || git checkout master'
scripts.sync:pull: git submodule foreach 'git pull origin $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)'
scripts.sync:commit: git add . && git commit -m 'Update submodules' && npm run sync:push
scripts.sync:full: npm run sync && npm run sync:commit
scripts.dev:all: echo 'Starting all services...' && cd spark && yarn start:dev & cd ../app && yarn start & cd ../cinder && yarn dev & cd ../website && yarn dev

author: Blaze Team
